scripts.build:packages: npm run build --workspace=packages/crypto && npm run build --workspace=packages/shared-types
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build --workspaces --if-present
scripts.setup: npm run setup:cloud-api && npm run setup:local-api
scripts.setup:cloud-api: cd apps/cloud-api && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
scripts.setup:local-api: cd apps/local-api && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev --name init
